short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of hearing about a certain attention-seeking candidate? This extension replaces his name with the name all Death-Eater's fear.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's apparent that this candidates actions are meant only to garner free publicity from those that are outrages.  Replace his name with another one you'd rather see instead, Voldemort.
